Rulings.Tengu:
(1) This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. (C) While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it be treated as an Effect Monster with this effect:● (2) Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Fiend-Type monster from your hand or from either player's GY. (3) When this card is removed from the field, destroy all Fiend-Type monsters Special Summoned by this effect.
●The (1) unclassified effect does not apply while Il Blud is in the Deck. It cannot be negated.
●The (C) Condition cannot be negated.
●The additional Normal Summon does not start a chain. Torrential Tribute can also activate.
●The (2) Ignition Effect can Special Summon from the hand or either GY.
●This effect continuously targets the Special Summoned monster(s) on the field.
●This effect does not target a monster in the GY. It is not negated by Necrovalley.
●If you activate the effect of Doom Shaman and an effect is chained that turns it face-down, the effect still resolves and you can Special Summon a monster.
●If a card is chained to this effect and destroys “Doom Shaman”, the effect to Special Summon is still resolved. The Special Summoned monster will not be destroyed by “Doom Shaman’s” effect.
●If there is no monster in either GY or in your hand that can be Special Summoned by this effect when it resolves, your opponent can look at your hand to verify.
●The (3) Continuous Effect does not start a chain.
●If Doom Shaman leaves the field while resolving a Chain, destroy all Fiend-Type monsters it Special Summoned before resolving the next effect in the chain.
●If Doom Shaman leaves the field while its effect is negated by Skill Drain, etc., monsters Special Summoned by its effect will not be destroyed.

Rulings.Cat:
● This card’s effect to destroy all Fiends Special Summoned by its effect when it leaves the field does not start a Chain.
● If you activate “Doom Shaman’s” effect, and a card is chained that destroys “Doom Shaman”, the effect to Special Summon is still resolved. The Special Summoned monster will not be destroyed by “Doom Shaman’s” effect.
● This card's effect does not target when activated. However, after a monster is Special Summoned with this effect, it is continuously targeted.
● If there is no monster in either GY or in your hand that can be Special Summoned by this effect when it resolves, your opponent can look at your hand to verify.
● If 'Doom Shaman' leaves the field while its effect is negated by 'Skill Drain', etc., monsters Special Summoned by its effect will not be destroyed.
● If you activate the effect of 'Doom Shaman' and an effect is chained that turns it face-down, the effect still resolves and you can Special Summon a monster.

Rulings.Circle:
● This card’s effect to destroy all Fiends Special Summoned by its effect when it leaves the field does not start a Chain.
● If you activate “Doom Shaman’s” effect, and a card is chained that destroys “Doom Shaman”, the effect to Special Summon is still resolved. The Special Summoned monster will not be destroyed by “Doom Shaman’s” effect.
● This card's effect does not target when activated. However, after a monster is Special Summoned with this effect, it is continuously targeted, so if you Special Summon 'Spirit Reaper', it will be destroyed immediately after the effect resolves.
● If there is no monster in either GY or in your hand that can be Special Summoned by this effect when it resolves, your opponent can look at your hand to verify.
● If 'Doom Shaman' leaves the field while its effect is negated by 'Skill Drain', etc., monsters Special Summoned by its effect will not be destroyed.
● If you activate the effect of 'Doom Shaman' and an effect is chained that turns it face-down, the effect still resolves and you can Special Summon a monster.
Rulings.Stein: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Base:
1. This card's effect to destroy all Fiend-Type monsters Special Summoned by its effect when it leaves the field does not start a Chain.
2. If you activate the effect of "Doom Shaman", and a card is chained that destroys "Doom Shaman", the effect to Special Summon is still resolved. The Special Summoned monster will not be destroyed by the effect of "Doom Shaman".
3. This card's effect does not target when activated. However, after a monster is Special Summoned with this effect, it is continuously targeted.
4. If there is no monster in either GY or in your hand that can be Special Summoned by this effect when it resolves, your opponent can look at your hand to verify.
5. If "Doom Shaman" leaves the field while its effect is negated by "Skill Drain", etc., monsters Special Summoned by its effect will not be destroyed.
6. If you activate the effect of "Doom Shaman" and an effect is chained that turns it face-down, the effect still resolves and you can Special Summon a monster.
